Low rise brief

100% comfort 100% of the time! C-IN2's bestselling CORE collection takes quality men's underwear to a new level with incredibly soft and supportive styles made of 100% cotton. Sexy, breathable, and too comfortable to resist, C-IN2's largest and most popular collection includes supportive underwear, tees, tanks, socks, and long johns. Classic white, black, and heather grey coloring and unbeattable design have you covered so you can feel good from start to finish, every single day.
